com.equinox

Class Storage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.equinox.Storage

  • public class Storage
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the storing of an instance of Memory into a file in JSON formatting, as well as the retrieving of an instance of Memory from a file in JSON formatting.
    Author:
    Jonathan Lim Siu Chi || ign3sc3nc3
